data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 7
data.actual_result: It is just an static image for Safari.
data.expected_result: You should see an animation for the Wumpus.
data.short_description: [Website bug] [Safari] No wumups animation for the company page
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the company page (/company) - Scroll down a bit to see the Wumpus with the jetpack - Observe it
